@btb101 - I appreciate ur concern. It sounds like you intend good for mankind. But when u mention:
thighing - it is a fatwa of shiite Ayatollah khomeni i.e his own sick opinion
6y bride - actually she was engaged 16 bride 19. arabic teen numbers are pronounced "one and ten, two and ten, three and ten.." etc. sometimes u miss the ten.
Kiddie fidddlers: lets not forget the catholic priest scandal. Also remember the several likes of josef fritzl, phil garrido, banged kid in prison for a decade. I think there are 7 of them in the media now. All non-muslim.
